comments: The genus Abelia named for Clarke Abel.
examples: Quercus chinensis C.Abel, Narr. Journey China: 165, cum ic. 363. (1818).
source: Barnhart, Biographical Notes upon Botanists (1965).  For dates see Charles J.Robinson, A register of the scholars admitted into Merchant Taylors' School, from A.D. 1562  to 1874, vol. 2: 172 (1883)
